Articles.Content:
10 pages or fewer left!! 

HYYYYYPPPPEEE!!
Go go go!
500 getting close, full hype steam ahead!
[https://youtu.be/jf0uheCVAME?t=119](https://youtu.be/jf0uheCVAME?t=119)
Next stop, page 500!!!
Fear the Hype train!!! all your internets belong to us 502 for the win

> 
> Just cleared out all my mods and saves for 1.0!

same here!

> 
> Nine, go!

Servers are responding too quickly, something is wrong..hype harder!
We may be able to double the previous record!

Do you hear the people sing

singing the song of angry men!!!!

Transitioning into final Hyping sequence...

Engines, go!
more coal!

I assume mod will lock it on 4999 post ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) and on 499 page ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
getting close!
[hype intensifies]

> 
> Plot twisting: the society who owns physic servers of Squad has shut them down because of black smoke

Society?

Physic? (1. a medicine that purges; cathartic; laxative.)

This is odd... is Squad home of some kind of secrete society that is going to purge the world of non-hypers?
Hype!
Thx for the rep!

> 
> more coal!

No problem. It appears to be spontaneously generating in the back.

> 
> 500 getting close, full hype steam ahead!

Aye, sir!!
We are gonna break it! Yeah! We are gonna break it! (sing it to "we don't wanna take it")
Wow, picking up more HYPE, keep it going!
Almost there!
Which mods do you thing will be ready first?
only five pages left! WHY ISN'T THIS LUDICROUS AS WHEN WE REACHED 400???
